title: Patch 7.14 fps drop
body: so ever since this new patch where Kayn was introduced I've had a major fps drop not even lag its just my fps. i tried everything the site says to do but nothing has worked to resolve my issue before patch 7.14 i would get around 45 to 60 fps but now in game i get around 8 to 15 and its super choppy and completely unplayable the only thing that has changed was the patch for league (7.14) and ever since then I've just not been able to play. anything that may help and any info on if this is a thing or is it just fuck me time right now{{champion:141}}

replies.body:
Same problem here, since 7.14 my FPS has been terrible. Used to be 120+ now it's between 2 and 40. It's the "stuttering" that makes it unplayable.
Doesn't matter if i use high or low settings, full screen or windowed. Followed the fps guide. did a re-install. The problem does not exist when i play with the practice tool. There 120 fps no problem.. play ARAM, 16fps.

You might have missed a driver update somewhere after the patch so make sure that you've checked all the steps in that [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) if you haven't yet. If you don't seem to make any progress with those steps, go ahead and try running a quick repair through the client options.
ive initiated a full repair in client twice done all the steps i could in the guide but nothing has helped{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hmmmm no worries just yet. Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to take a deeper look over your system to see exactly what's happening.
Can you guys just take a deeper look over your spaghetti code?

It's not like even the pro players that have got high end computers are having fps issues, a good example is Gosu i was watching his stream and he had between 60-100 at some point,we can't do anything with tickets and that post if our computers are ok,i get 100+ fps on gta 5 but 20-70 on league of legends, has league of legends more realistic graphics to not work on my computer ?
thank you BROPORO the FPS guide was really usefull and it did fix my "ms" spikes :D

+1

I did everything you recommend, tested 4 different graphic Card Drivers, repaired 3 times, tested a lot of different ingame Settings from the lowest of the lowest to low Client mode, although my pc could handle it on max settings. Set my pc freshly up. Tested Audio Drivers. closed/shut down everything that could possibly mess with the Connection.

Game worked okaish pre 7.14, with 7.14 :


- random lag Spikes out of nowhere and sudden loss of  fps.
- fps loss in fights ( worst experience is when you have a Singed on Speed poisoning around. a lagfest at best )
- fps Drops to Zero when opening ingame shop, sometimes takes up to 10 seconds to recover.
- The splitsecond before you die, the fps Drops to Zero, takes a few seconds until it recovers and the Grey Screen appears.

Yet we "might" have missed an update here or there. Gosh, salty af!

To Quote a popular Phrase back in the days when Ghostcrawler was at Blizzard: " Never Play on patch day " !
hey, do you solved that problem with fps? Please let me know...thanks

yep. Just started for me too after the latest patch when Kayn got added. Updated my graphics drivers, cleaned my laptop internally with compressed air, did full client repair, nothing worked. The animations are just randomly lagging and this has never happened before. Is riot going to actually address this issue since clearly its not just one or two people having it....
ive done everything you said too, even factory reset and updated to windows 10 to see if itll help but nothing has changed at all. Messaged player support havent heard back for a week
Been having some fps drops after 7.14 right around when i updated my computer but im pretty sure it has nothing to do with that.

Jesus christ, fucking Riot man. I also have this exact problem and I've opened a ticket. Nothing from them. The problem for me is horrible FPS anytime a new animation loads whether it be in-client or in-game. Every other game is fine for me.
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6nbrkr/anyone_else_having_trouble_with_patch_714/

Same here, especially on the ARAM map but also in Rift it suddenly drops 40-50 FPS which causes me to die quite alot, starting to get really annoying.
The game is unplayable at the moment, I remember hearing streamers complain about this too (QTpie, Scarra had big FPS drops) it seemed to be fixed for them but it's still not fixed for me.
Which is weird because I never had any trouble with league, I had 200+ FPS easily now it keeps dropping to 50-40.
Would be nice of Riot actually responded to one of these threads, there are quite alot of people complaining about this lately, fix dem spaghetti codes Rito.
hey, do you solved that problem with fps? Please let me know...thanks

yeah nah m8 my laptop went for 70 fps to 60 and hella laggy like I could teleport to random places sometimes and die hope the patch this soon 
{{summoner:31}}
I've had the same problem and I've lowered all game settings and even set my computer to best performance and it's still only 40  - 9

i was reading ur posts and that is my issue on the head for instance my fps ranges arnd 55-50 normally but lately its been dipping to 23ish at times and last ascension game at the end playing ww it dropped to 09fps at the lowest and never got higher then 13 no matter what i did. it cost me a high grade giving me a c+ cause it was so gosh darn choppy. oh and it might be important to note that both teams had a kayne both in darkin form. i can provide log file outputs if requested.
I am having the same issues since patch 7.14. In rare games I get good DPS but now most of the matches my FPS drops to 50s even with low specs.

I have the exacly same problem. Have an i7-4790k with nVidia gtx 980ti so shouldnt have this kind of problem. The fps are droping from 200 to 50 in teamfights. champions spells are delayed like im having lag but just have 30 ms. did someone find a solution ? Thanks
I had sort of the same issue with my Nvidia driver. Try rolling back your display driver to the most recent one.
